summary: P0 Bug Fix VERIFIED - Admin-edited equipment values now correctly appear in UI dropdowns. The useMemo fix in EquipmentRack.js successfully re-snapshots equipment objects when equipmentLoaded changes, causing React to re-render with fresh database values.
passed_tests: Radio dropdown shows Cobra 29 LTD (1W) - database value, not hardcoded 0.75W - PASS
Radio dropdown shows Galaxy DX 959 (5W) - database value, not hardcoded 2W - PASS
Radio dropdown shows Stryker SR-955HPC (8W) - database value, not hardcoded 3W - PASS
Radio dropdown shows Connex 4300HP (10W) - database value, not hardcoded 3.5W - PASS
Radio dropdown shows Ranger RCI-2970N2 (12W) - database value, not hardcoded 4W - PASS
Custom equipment 'Cobra 29 Ltd (Modded)' (0.75W) appears in Radio dropdown - PASS
DEAD KEY display shows 1W for Cobra 29 LTD (database value) - PASS
DEAD KEY display shows 0.75W for Cobra 29 Ltd (Modded) - PASS
Signal Chain Summary shows correct Radio wattage (1W for Cobra 29 LTD) - PASS
Driver Amplifiers dropdown loads correctly with all options - PASS
Final Amplifiers dropdown loads correctly with all options - PASS
Antennas dropdown loads correctly with all options - PASS
critical_code_review_comments: useMemo hooks in EquipmentRack.js (lines 30-33) correctly re-snapshot equipment objects when equipmentLoaded changes
RFContext.js correctly increments equipmentLoaded after mergeEquipmentFromAPI runs (line 46)
mergeEquipmentFromAPI in rfEngine.js correctly mutates RADIOS, DRIVER_AMPS, FINAL_AMPS, ANTENNAS objects
The fix addresses the root cause: React wasn't re-rendering because UI components imported equipment objects at module load time
context_for_next_testing_agent: P0 bug fix verified. Equipment values from database now correctly appear in all dropdowns. Key fix was adding useMemo hooks in EquipmentRack.js that depend on equipmentLoaded state, which triggers re-render when API data is merged. Database values: Cobra 29 LTD (1W), Galaxy DX 959 (5W), Stryker SR-955HPC (8W), Connex 4300HP (10W), Ranger RCI-2970N2 (12W). Custom equipment 'Cobra 29 Ltd (Modded)' (0.75W) also appears correctly.

bug_fix_verification.root_cause: mergeEquipmentFromAPI mutated objects but React didn't re-render because UI components imported equipment objects at module load time
bug_fix_verification.fix_applied: Added useMemo hooks in EquipmentRack.js (lines 30-33) that re-snapshot equipment objects when equipmentLoaded state changes
bug_fix_verification.verification_method: Playwright UI testing - verified all radio dropdown values match database, not hardcoded defaults
